GSM2667747.title: hesc_cyto_rep1
GSM2667747.characteristics_ch1: cell type: Human embryonic stem cells (hESC)
GSM2667747.growth_protocol_ch1: Cells were grown according to cell-type specific requirements and were actively growing when harvested
GSM2667747.extract_protocol_ch1: Libraries were prepared using the Illumina TruSeq Stranded Total RNA kit using 100ng RNA input and 13 PCR cycles.
GSM2667747.data_processing: Basecalling was performed on-instrument and converted to FASTQ using bcl2fastq v2.17.
GSM2667747.data_processing.2: Transcript isoform level abundances were calculated using Kallisto v0.43 and normalized between samples.
GSM2667747.data_processing.3: Transcript abundances were aggregated to the gene-level using tximport.
GSM2667747.data_processing.5: Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TSV files include TPM (transcripts per million) for Ensembl transcripts from protein coding genes in release 84.
